title.rendered: Artificial intelligence in radiology – use cases and trends

<title>Artificial Intelligence in Radiology - Advantages, Use Cases & Trends — ITRex</title>
<meta name="description" content="Artificial intelligence in radiology brought many advantages to the healthcare industry by using machine learning algorithms to read radiology scans, detect, and classify medical conditions from brain tumors to hip fractures.
